--- layout: example.html title: Custom Drag-and-Drop (MVT preview) shortdesc: Example of using the drag-and-drop interaction with a custom format to preview MVT tiles. docs: > Example of using the drag-and-drop interaction with a custom format to preview MVT tiles. In addition to the formats used in the [Drag-and-Drop](drag-and-drop.html) example individual MVT tiles can be previewed. There is no projection transform support, so this will only work with data in EPSG:4326 and EPSG:3857. tags: "drag-and-drop, mvt" ---

Tile coordinate    z:  x:  y:
